comments.body:
turning this on means my IDE warns about stuff like:

```
An error was detected when looking at import dependencies within the flutter_tools package:
/tmp/flutter sdk/packages/flutter_tools/lib/src/vmservice.dart imports flutter_tools.
```

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +9,13 @@    curly_braces_in_flow_control_structures: true
    avoid_catches_without_on_clauses: true
    prefer_relative_imports: true
